title: Introducing: Finel
body:
With Montreal’s pop scene experiencing a fantastic few years, with the likes of Blue Hawaii, Grimes and Chromeo all finding commercial and critical success, it’s comfortably one of the most exciting places for new music right now.

**Finel**, a duo from The City of Saints, are from a similar sort of musical background, and their two debut tracks showcase as much. The collaborative efforts of [OHARA](https://soundcloud.com/oharasongs) and [Tinsel](https://soundcloud.com/tin-sel) join together for _Fire_ and _Fall In To You_, promising, albeit slightly rough around the edges, twisted electronic-pop not too far from the aforementioned Blue Hawaii or Mozart’s Sister. Check out both below.
